dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2024, the National Security Committee of Kazakhstan just had to deny a fake press release.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty four, the National Security Committee of Kazakhstan just had to deny a fake press release.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it was about a supposed Telegram bot, right? For collecting info on people boycotting the Immortal Regiment event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it was about a supposed Telegram bot, right? For collecting info on people boycotting the Immortal Regiment event.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Security Committee (NSC) of Kazakhstan has stated that an allegedly official press release about the creation of a Telegram bot to collect information on certain individuals is a fake. The claim concerns individuals who are boycotting the Immortal Regiment event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The fake statement was, uh, circulating on social media, claiming to be from the NSC's own press service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The fake statement was, uh, circulating on social media, claiming to be from the N S C's own press service.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A so-called ˜official statement of the NSC press service' is circulating on social media, alleging the creation of a Telegram bot to collect data on individuals spreading anti-patriotic rhetoric, calling for a boycott of the ˜Immortal Regiment' event, or engaging in other actions aimed at dividing society, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is pretty bold—impersonating an official security body like that. They were saying the bot would target people spreading, um, what they called "anti-patriotic rhetoric."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is pretty bold-impersonating an official security body like that. They were saying the bot would target people spreading, um, what they called anti-patriotic rhetoric.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A so-called ˜official statement of the NSC press service' is circulating on social media, alleging the creation of a Telegram bot to collect data on individuals spreading anti-patriotic rhetoric, calling for a boycott of the ˜Immortal Regiment' event, or engaging in other actions aimed at dividing society, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the NSC came out very clearly—said it's all false, urged people not to share it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the N S C came out very clearly-said it's all false, urged people not to share it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The NSC confirmed that this ˜statement' is fake, the information presented in it is false, and they urged citizens to trust only official sources and avoid spreading misinformation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—why would someone go to the trouble of faking something like that? To stir up fear, maybe?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-why would someone go to the trouble of faking something like that? To stir up fear, maybe?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Or to discredit the committee itself. Either way, they reminded everyone to only trust statements on their official websites and social media.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or to discredit the committee itself. Either way, they reminded everyone to only trust statements on their official websites and social media.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis were also reminded that all official NSC statements are published on the committee's official websites and social media accounts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, 'cause these kinds of fakes can really muddy the waters, especially around sensitive events like the Immortal Regiment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, 'cause these kinds of fakes can really muddy the waters, especially around sensitive events like the Immortal Regiment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a big deal in Kazakhstan—honoring World War II veterans. So any call to boycott it is gonna get attention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a big deal in Kazakhstan-honoring World War I I veterans. So any call to boycott it is gonna get attention.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And now with this fake bot story, it just adds another layer of confusion and suspicion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now with this fake bot story, it just adds another layer of confusion and suspicion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The NSC was smart to shut it down fast. Misinformation like that can spread way too easily.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The N S C was smart to shut it down fast. Misinformation like that can spread way too easily.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. People might've actually believed there was some, like, government surveillance bot tracking dissent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. People might've actually believed there was some, like, government surveillance bot tracking dissent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. So their quick response was crucial—clear, direct, from the actual official channels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. So their quick response was crucial-clear, direct, from the actual official channels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Hopefully it stops the rumor in its tracks. You see less of that nonsense going around now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hopefully it stops the rumor in its tracks. You see less of that nonsense going around now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hard to say, but at least the record's straight from the source.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hard to say, but at least the record's straight from the source.
